text:
A class IX student of the Army School Mamoon, near Pathankot, was detained for allegedly sending fake messages on WhatsApp warning of an attack on Himachal Pradesh, the police said.

On Friday, the Nalagarh police received a complaint from one Gaurav Sharma that he had received several WhatsApp messages from an overseas number.

Within three hours, the Technical Cell of Southern Range, Shimla, found that the messages had been sent by the student as a prank, Inspector-General of Police, Shimla Zahur H. Zaidi said. — PTI
title: Teenager detained for sending fake messages
